api

Interface Space

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.rmi.Remote
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    SpaceImpl

    public interface Space
extends java.rmi.Remote
    The remote interface through which different tasks are submitted and results obtained It acts as a channel for passing messages between Client and ComputeServers. The implementation defines mechanisms to wait for an available Task, to hold them and assign it to the ComputeServers and then process the Result objects.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.lang.String SERVICE_NAME
      The name under which the RMI registry binds the remote reference.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void put(Task<?> task)
      A remote method used by the Clients to put the Task into the ComputeSpace
      void stop()
      A remote method to stop the execution of the ComputeSpace
      Result<?> take()
      A remote method to take the Result that has been computed by the ComputeServers.

    • Field Detail

      • SERVICE_NAME

        static final java.lang.String SERVICE_NAME
        The name under which the RMI registry binds the remote reference.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Method Detail

      • put

        void put(Task<?> task)
         throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        A remote method used by the Clients to put the Task into the ComputeSpace
        Parameters:
        task - the actual task
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - the remote exception

      • take

        Result<?> take()
               throws java.rmi.RemoteException,
                      java.lang.InterruptedException
        A remote method to take the Result that has been computed by the ComputeServers. This method blocks until a Result is available to return to the client
        Returns:
        result
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - the remote exception
        java.lang.InterruptedException - the interrupted exception

      • stop

        void stop()
          throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        A remote method to stop the execution of the ComputeSpace
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - the remote exception
